distance.description: Specifies the distance (in price units) from the Trade's open price to use as the Stop Loss Order price. Only one of the distance and price fields may be specified.

price.description: The price that the Stop Loss Order will be triggered at. Only one of the price and distance fields may be specified.

gtdTime.description: The date when the Stop Loss Order will be cancelled on if timeInForce is GTD.

guaranteed.description: Flag indicating that the price for the Stop Loss Order is guaranteed. The default value depends on the GuaranteedStopLossOrderMode of the account, if it is REQUIRED, the default will be true, for DISABLED or ENABLED the default is false.

timeInForce.description: The time in force for the created Stop Loss Order. This may only be GTC, GTD or GFD.

price.description: The price that the Take Profit Order will be triggered at. Only one of the price and distance fields may be specified.

gtdTime.description: The date when the Take Profit Order will be cancelled on if timeInForce is GTD.

timeInForce.description: The time in force for the created Take Profit Order. This may only be GTC, GTD or GFD.

clientTradeID.description: The client ID of the Trade requested to be closed

units.description: Indication of how much of the Trade to close. Either "ALL", or a DecimalNumber reflection a partial close of the Trade.

tradeID.description: The ID of the Trade requested to be closed

units.description: The quantity requested to be filled by the Market Order. A posititive number of units results in a long Order, and a negative number of units results in a short Order.

positionFill.description: Specification of how Positions in the Account are modified when the Order is filled.

id.description: The Order's identifier, unique within the Order's Account.

state.description: The current state of the Order.

priceBound.description: The worst price that the client is willing to have the Market Order filled at.

reason.description: The reason the Market Order was created to perform a margin closeout

timeInForce.description: The time-in-force requested for the Market Order. Restricted to FOK or IOC for a MarketOrder.

clientTradeID.description: The Client ID of the Trade being closed

sourceTransactionID.description: The Transaction ID of the DelayedTradeClosure transaction to which this Delayed Trade Close belongs to

tradeID.description: The ID of the Trade being closed

distance.description: The distance (in price units) from the Trade's fill price that the Trailing Stop Loss Order will be triggered at.

gtdTime.description: The date when the Trailing Stop Loss Order will be cancelled on if timeInForce is GTD.

timeInForce.description: The time in force for the created Trailing Stop Loss Order. This may only be GTC, GTD or GFD.

tradeClosedIDs.description: Trade IDs of Trades closed when the Order was filled (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED and one or more Trades were closed as a result of the fill)

tradeReducedID.description: Trade ID of Trade reduced when the Order was filled (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED and a Trade was reduced as a result of the fill)

tradeOpenedID.description: Trade ID of Trade opened when the Order was filled (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED and a Trade was opened as a result of the fill)

cancellingTransactionID.description: ID of the Transaction that cancelled the Order (only provided when the Order's state is CANCELLED)

comment.description: A comment associated with the Order/Trade

id.description: The Client ID of the Order/Trade

tag.description: A tag associated with the Order/Trade

instrument.description: The instrument of the Position being closed out.

units.description: Indication of how much of the Position to close. Either "ALL", or a DecimalNumber reflection a partial close of the Trade. The DecimalNumber must always be positive, and represent a number that doesn't exceed the absolute size of the Position.

createTime.description: The time when the Order was created.

cancelledTime.description: Date/time when the Order was cancelled (only provided when the state of the Order is CANCELLED)

filledTime.description: Date/time when the Order was filled (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED)

fillingTransactionID.description: ID of the Transaction that filled this Order (only provided when the Order's state is FILLED)
